pr_title: Introduce tool for migrating instance configs to property store

timeline.message:
Introduce tool for migrating instance configs to property store

This HelixBootstrapUpgradeTool operation will fetch all instance configs
for a cluster, convert them into the new format, and then persist them
in the property store.

timeline.bodyText:
Optional: considering making this multi-threaded (one thread  per colo).
(Never mind, it should be fine, as it's one-off operation)
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: Parallelism is a good idea anyways. I made this multi-threaded since it doesn't add much complexity to the code.
replies.author: cgtz

timeline.bodyText: Thanks for simplifying this. Could you also make the change for uploadClusterAdminInfos method as well (line 701 ~ 705)?
